ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${contact} is ${state} then send ${person} a message via ${method}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: Pressing ${care pendent}, will trigger a Care Alarm on the Premium Plan and a Panic Alarm on the Basic Plan.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:name: Care Pendant Trigger

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${button} is pressed, then ${control} ${garage door}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:extra: Keyfobs and Pendants are subject to delays in order to conserve battery life.
ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: Run the ${scene} scene when someone arrives to an empty house.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:name: Disarm with the 1st Gen Key Fob

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When the security alarm is set to ${state}, then ${control} the ${garage_door}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${device} is turned on or off, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:name: Irrigation Changed Locally

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${motion sensor} detects motion, start record video from ${camera} for ${duration}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${button} is pressed on ${key fob}, then ${control} ${garage door}.
ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:description: Use the 1st Gen Key Fob to open or close a garage door when a button is pressed.
ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:name: Open Garage Door with a 1st Gen Key Fob

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When someone turns the ${thermostat} on and any door or window sensor is open send ${person} a message via ${method}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${person or device} returns home, then unlock ${doorlock}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${device} temperature goes ${above or below} ${value}, then send ${person} a message via ${method}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:name: Monitor Room Temperature

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When ${button} is pressed then run ${scene}.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:template: When the ${button} is pressed on ${smart fob}, set the alarm to On.

ruleTemplates.ruletmpl:name: Arm On with the Smart Fob
